name: html-playground
description: A website to understand how HTML elements behave in their out-of-the-box state.

scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run build:eleventy
scripts.start: npm run clear && npm run serve
scripts.staging:
npm run build && echo 'User-agent: *
Disallow: /' > dist/robots.txt
scripts.bump:major: bump major --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' src/site/_data/site.json *.json
scripts.bump:minor: bump minor --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' src/site/_data/site.json *.json
scripts.bump:patch: bump patch --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' src/site/_data/site.json *.json

author: Martin Underhill
